attributes.additional_details: Thomas Moore (99) set out to raise £1000, by walking 100 lengths of his garden, by the age of 100, miraculously he has now raised over £12million for the NHS. He complicated this feat on 16/04/2020. Way before the deadline and way above the funds he wanted to achieve.

rejection.details:
In any case we can't publish petitions calling for people to receive an honour. 

You can find out more about the honours process and how to nominate someone at www.gov.uk/honours
